works.description:
The author of the website below directly copied our original content from CodeCanyon.  This original content was created by us, for use by CodeCanyon only.  The author didn't ask for permission to use the content, and blatantly copied the content without making any changes whatsoever.  

We have contacted the website owner to request the content be removed with no response.

http://codecanyon.net/item/bestimonials/151478
http://bestimonials.backendlabs.com/

Those are the only authorized copies.  The first link is our sales page on CodeCanyon, and is the page that is being copied directly by devinfo007.com.

http://www.devinfo007.com/2011/bestimonials-miscellaneous/

Notice the above URL.  Bestimonials is a product owned by Backend Labs, Inc.  The content on that page is a direct copy of our sales page on CodeCanyon, which was original content created by our team. (http://codecanyon.net/item/bestimonials/151478)
